query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Affetto al suo piacer, quel contemplante 2 libero officio di dottore assunse, 3 e cominciò queste parole sante:
4 «La piaga che Maria richiuse e unse, 5 quella ch’è tanto bella da’ suoi piedi 6 è colei che l’aperse e che la punse.
query.result:
**English:**
1 Moved by his pleasure, that contemplative one 2 assumed the free office of a doctor, 3 and began these holy words:
4 "The wound that Mary closed and anointed, 5 that which is so beautiful at her feet, 6 is the one that opened and pierced it.
**Malay:**
1 Tergerak oleh kesenangannya, perenung itu 2 mengambil tugas bebas sebagai seorang doktor, 3 dan memulai kata-kata suci ini:
4 "Luka yang Maria tutup dan urapi, 5 yang begitu indah di kakinya, 6 adalah luka yang membukanya dan menusuknya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Ne l’ordine che fanno i terzi sedi, 8 siede Rachel di sotto da costei 9 con Bëatrice, sì come tu vedi.
query.result:
**English:**
7 In the order that the holy seats make, 8 Rachel sits below her 9 with Beatrice, just as you see.
**Malay:**
7 Dalam urutan yang dibuat oleh tempat duduk para suci, 8 Rachel duduk di bawahnya 9 bersama Beatrice, seperti yang kamu lihat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Sarra e Rebecca, Iudìt e colei 11 che fu bisava al cantor che per doglia 12 del fallo disse ‘Miserere mei’,
13 puoi tu veder così di soglia in soglia 14 giù digradar, com’ io ch’a proprio nome 15 vo per la rosa giù di foglia in foglia.
query.result:
**English:**
10 Sarah and Rebecca, Judith and she 11 who was a pagan to the singer who, in grief 12 for his sin, said ‘Have mercy on me’,
13 you can see thus from threshold to threshold 14 going down, as I who in my own name 15 go down through the rose from leaf to leaf.
**Malay:**
10 Sarah dan Rebecca, Judith dan dia 11 yang kafir kepada penyanyi yang karena duka 12 atas dosanya berkata ‘Kasihanilah aku’,
13 kamu dapat melihat demikian dari ambang ke ambang 14 turun ke bawah, seperti aku yang dengan namaku sendiri 15 turun melalui mawar dari daun ke daun.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 E come quinci il glorïoso scanno 29 de la donna del cielo e li altri scanni 30 di sotto lui cotanta cerna fanno,
31 così di contra quel del gran Giovanni, 32 che sempre santo ’l diserto e ’l martiro 33 sofferse, e poi l’inferno da due anni;
34 e sotto lui così cerner sortiro 35 Francesco, Benedetto e Augustino 36 e altri fin qua giù di giro in giro.
query.result:
**English:**
28 And as here the glorious throne 29 of the lady of heaven and the other thrones 30 below it make such a great circle,
31 so opposite that of the great John, 32 who always holy suffered the desert and martyrdom 33 and then hell for two years;
34 and below him thus obtained their places 35 Francis, Benedict, and Augustine 36 and others down here from circle to circle.
**Malay:**
28 Dan sebagaimana di sini takhta mulia 29 dari wanita surga dan takhta-takhta lainnya 30 di bawahnya membuat lingkaran yang begitu besar,
31 begitu pula di seberangnya takhta Yohanes yang agung, 32 yang selalu suci menderita di padang pasir dan kesyahidan 33 dan kemudian neraka selama dua tahun;
34 dan di bawahnya demikianlah memperoleh tempat mereka 35 Fransiskus, Benediktus, dan Augustinus 36 dan yang lainnya sampai di sini dari lingkaran ke lingkaran.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Or mira l’alto proveder divino: 38 ché l’uno e l’altro aspetto de la fede 39 igualmente empierà questo giardino.
query.result:
**English:**
37 Now behold the high divine providence: 38 that both the one and the other aspect of faith 39 will equally fill this garden.
**Malay:**
37 Sekarang lihatlah pemeliharaan ilahi yang tinggi: 38 bahwa aspek iman yang satu dan yang lainnya 39 akan sama-sama memenuhi taman ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 E sappi che dal grado in giù che fiede 41 a mezzo il tratto le due discrezioni, 42 per nullo proprio merito si siede,
43 ma per l’altrui, con certe condizioni: 44 ché tutti questi son spiriti ascolti 45 prima ch’avesser vere elezïoni.
query.result:
**English:**
40 And know that from the grade below which it stinks 41 halfway up, the two discretions 42 are seated through no merit of their own,
43 but through someone else’s, with certain conditions: 44 for all these spirits are listened to 45 before they have true choices.
**Malay:**
40 Dan ketahuilah bahwa dari tingkat di bawah yang berbau busuk 41 di tengah jalan, dua kebijaksanaan, 42 tidak duduk karena jasa mereka sendiri,
43 tetapi karena jasa orang lain, dengan syarat-syarat tertentu: 44 karena semua roh ini didengarkan 45 sebelum mereka memiliki pilihan yang sebenarnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 Ben te ne puoi accorger per li volti 47 e anche per le voci püerili, 48 se tu li guardi bene e se li ascolti.
query.result:
**English:**
46 You can surely perceive it from their faces 47 and also from their childish voices, 48 if you look at them carefully and listen to them.
**Malay:**
46 Pasti kau dapat melihatnya dari wajah-wajah mereka 47 dan juga dari suara-suara kekanak-kanakan mereka, 48 jika kau memperhatikan mereka dengan saksama dan mendengarkan mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Or dubbi tu e dubitando sili; 50 ma io discioglierò ’l forte legame 51 in che ti stringon li pensier sottili.
query.result:
**English:**
49 Either you doubt, or doubting you dissemble; 50 but I will loosen the strong bond 51 in which your subtle thoughts hold you.
**Malay:**
49 Atau kamu ragu dan meragukan dirimu sendiri; 50 tetapi aku akan melepaskan ikatan kuat 51 yang dengannya pikiran-pikiran halusmu mengikatmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Dentro a l’ampiezza di questo reame 53 casüal punto non puote aver sito, 54 se non come tristizia o sete o fame:
55 ché per etterna legge è stabilito 56 quantunque vedi, sì che giustamente 57 ci si risponde da l’anello al dito;
58 e però questa festinata gente 59 a vera vita non è sine causa 60 intra sé qui più e meno eccellente.
query.result:
**English:**
52 Within the vastness of this realm 53 no random point can have a place, 54 except as sadness or thirst or hunger:
55 because by eternal law it is established 56 everything you see, so that justly 57 one responds to the other like a ring to a finger;
58 and therefore these hasty people 59 are not without reason excluded from true life, 60 here among themselves more or less excellent.
**Malay:**
52 Di dalam keluasan kerajaan ini 53 titik kasual tidak dapat memiliki tempat, 54 kecuali sebagai kesedihan atau dahaga atau kelaparan:
55 karena oleh hukum abadi telah ditetapkan 56 semua yang kamu lihat, sehingga dengan adil 57 seseorang menanggapi yang lain seperti cincin pada jari;
58 dan karena itu orang-orang yang tergesa-gesa ini 59 tidak tanpa alasan dikecualikan dari kehidupan sejati, 60 di sini di antara mereka sendiri lebih atau kurang unggul.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Lo rege per cui questo regno pausa 62 in tanto amore e in tanto diletto, 63 che nulla volontà è di più ausa,
64 le menti tutte nel suo lieto aspetto 65 creando, a suo piacer di grazia dota 66 diversamente; e qui basti l’effetto.
query.result:
**English:**
61 The king for whom this realm is at peace 62 in so much love and in so much delight, 63 that no will is more daring,
64 creates all minds in his joyful aspect, 65 endowing them with grace according to his pleasure, 66 in different ways; and here the effect suffices.
**Malay:**
61 Raja yang dengannya kerajaan ini beristirahat 62 dalam begitu banyak cinta dan kesenangan, 63 sehingga tidak ada keinginan yang lebih berani,
64 menciptakan semua pikiran dalam aspeknya yang menyenangkan, 65 menganugerahkan mereka dengan rahmat sesuai dengan kesenangannya, 66 dengan cara yang berbeda; dan di sini efeknya sudah cukup.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 E ciò espresso e chiaro vi si nota 68 ne la Scrittura santa in quei gemelli 69 che ne la madre ebber l’ira commota.
query.result:
**English:**
67 And this is expressed and clearly noted 68 in the holy Scripture in those twins 69 who in their mother stirred up wrath.
**Malay:**
67 Dan ini dinyatakan dan jelas terlihat 68 dalam Kitab Suci pada anak kembar itu 69 yang dalam rahim ibunya menimbulkan kemarahan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Però, secondo il color d’i capelli, 71 di cotal grazia l’altissimo lume 72 degnamente convien che s’incappelli.
query.result:
**English:**
70 However, according to the color of his hair, 71 the highest light is worthily 72 to be crowned with such grace.
**Malay:**
70 Akan tetapi, menurut warna rambutnya, 71 cahaya yang tertinggi itu 72 layak untuk dimahkotai dengan rahmat yang demikian.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Dunque, sanza mercé di lor costume, 74 locati son per gradi differenti, 75 sol differendo nel primiero acume.
query.result:
**English:**
73 Therefore, without the mercy of their custom, 74 they are placed in different grades, 75 differing only in their initial sharpness.
**Malay:**
73 Oleh karena itu, tanpa belas kasihan dari kebiasaan mereka, 74 mereka ditempatkan dalam tingkatan yang berbeda, 75 hanya berbeda dalam ketajaman awal mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Riguarda omai ne la faccia che a Cristo 86 più si somiglia, ché la sua chiarezza 87 sola ti può disporre a veder Cristo».
query.result:
**English:**
85 Look now upon the face that most resembles Christ, 86 for its brightness alone can prepare you to see Christ.
**Malay:**
85 Pandanglah sekarang pada wajah yang paling menyerupai Kristus, 86 karena kecemerlangannya sendiri dapat mempersiapkanmu untuk melihat Kristus.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 Io vidi sopra lei tanta allegrezza 89 piover, portata ne le menti sante 90 create a trasvolar per quella altezza,
91 che quantunque io avea visto davante, 92 di tanta ammirazion non mi sospese, 93 né mi mostrò di Dio tanto sembiante;
94 e quello amor che primo lì discese, 95 cantando ‘Ave, Maria, gratïa plena’, 96 dinanzi a lei le sue ali distese.
query.result:
**English:**
88 I saw so much joy raining down upon her, 89 carried by the holy minds 90 created to fly through that height,
91 that although I had seen it before, 92 it did not suspend me in such wonder, 93 nor did it show me so much of God's countenance;
94 and that love which first descended there, 95 singing ‘Ave, Maria, gratia plena’, 96 spread its wings before her.
**Malay:**
88 Aku melihat begitu banyak kegembiraan menghujani dirinya, 89 dibawa oleh pikiran-pikiran suci 90 yang diciptakan untuk terbang menembus ketinggian itu,
91 bahwa meskipun aku telah melihatnya sebelumnya, 92 itu tidak membuatku begitu takjub, 93 atau menunjukkan kepadaku begitu banyak wajah Tuhan;
94 dan cinta yang pertama kali turun ke sana, 95 bernyanyi ‘Ave, Maria, gratia plena’, 96 membentangkan sayapnya di hadapannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Rispuose a la divina cantilena 98 da tutte parti la beata corte, 99 sì ch’ogne vista sen fé più serena.
query.result:
**English:**
97 The blessed court responded to the divine song 98 from all sides, 99 so that every sight became more serene.
**Malay:**
97 Mahkamah yang diberkati itu menjawab nyanyian suci 98 dari semua sisi, 99 sehingga setiap pemandangan menjadi lebih tenang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 «O santo padre, che per me comporte 101 l’esser qua giù, lasciando il dolce loco 102 nel qual tu siedi per etterna sorte,
103 qual è quell’ angel che con tanto gioco 104 guarda ne li occhi la nostra regina, 105 innamorato sì che par di foco?».
query.result:
**English:**
100 "O holy father, who for my sake 101 endure being down here, leaving the sweet place 102 where you sit by eternal decree,
103 who is that angel who with such joy 104 looks into the eyes of our queen, 105 so enamored that he seems to be on fire?".
**Malay:**
100 "Wahai bapa suci, yang demi aku 101 menanggung keberadaan di bawah sini, meninggalkan tempat yang manis 102 tempat engkau duduk karena takdir abadi,
103 siapakah malaikat itu yang dengan begitu gembira 104 menatap mata ratu kita, 105 begitu jatuh cinta hingga tampak seperti api?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Così ricorsi ancora a la dottrina 107 di colui ch’abbelliva di Maria, 108 come del sole stella mattutina.
query.result:
**English:**
106 Thus I resorted again to the doctrine 107 of him who adorned Mary, 108 as the morning star of the sun.
**Malay:**
106 Maka aku kembali lagi kepada doktrin 107 dari dia yang menghiasi Maria, 108 sebagai bintang fajar matahari.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Ed elli a me: «Baldezza e leggiadria 110 quant’ esser puote in angelo e in alma, 111 tutta è in lui; e sì volem che sia,
112 perch’ elli è quelli che portò la palma 113 giuso a Maria, quando ’l Figliuol di Dio 114 carcar si volse de la nostra salma.
query.result:
**English:**
109 And he to me: "Grace and loveliness, 110 as much as can be in angel and in soul, 111 are all in him; and we will that it be so,
112 because he is the one who bore the palm 113 down to Mary, when the Son of God 114 wished to burden himself with our human form.
**Malay:**
109 Dan dia kepadaku: "Keberanian dan keanggunan, 110 sebanyak yang dapat ada pada malaikat dan jiwa, 111 semuanya ada padanya; dan kami menghendaki demikian,
112 karena dialah yang membawa palma 113 turun kepada Maria, ketika Putra Tuhan 114 ingin membebani dirinya dengan wujud manusia kita.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Ma vieni omai con li occhi sì com’ io 116 andrò parlando, e nota i gran patrici 117 di questo imperio giustissimo e pio.
query.result:
**English:**
115 But now come with your eyes as I 116 go on speaking, and note the great patricians 117 of this most just and pious empire.
**Malay:**
115 Tetapi sekarang datanglah dengan matamu sebagaimana aku 116 akan berbicara, dan perhatikan para bangsawan besar 117 dari kerajaan yang paling adil dan saleh ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Quei due che seggon là sù più felici 119 per esser propinquissimi ad Agusta, 120 son d’esta rosa quasi due radici:
121 colui che da sinistra le s’aggiusta 122 è il padre per lo cui ardito gusto 123 l’umana specie tanto amaro gusta;
124 dal destro vedi quel padre vetusto 125 di Santa Chiesa a cui Cristo le chiavi 126 raccomandò di questo fior venusto.
query.result:
**English:**
118 Those two who are said to be happier up there 119 for being closest to Augusta, 120 are like two roots of this rose:
121 the one who is placed on its left 122 is the father for whose bold taste 123 the human race tastes so much bitterness;
124 on the right you see that ancient father 125 of the Holy Church to whom Christ 126 entrusted the keys to this beautiful flower.
**Malay:**
118 Kedua orang yang dikatakan lebih bahagia di atas sana 119 karena paling dekat dengan Augusta, 120 adalah seperti dua akar dari bunga mawar ini:
121 orang yang ditempatkan di sebelah kirinya 122 adalah bapa yang karena seleranya yang berani 123 umat manusia merasakan begitu banyak kepahitan;
124 di sebelah kanan Anda melihat bapa kuno itu 125 dari Gereja Suci yang kepadanya Kristus 126 mempercayakan kunci bunga yang indah ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 E quei che vide tutti i tempi gravi, 128 pria che morisse, de la bella sposa 129 che s’acquistò con la lancia e coi clavi,
130 siede lungh’ esso, e lungo l’altro posa 131 quel duca sotto cui visse di manna 132 la gente ingrata, mobile e retrosa.
query.result:
**English:**
127 And he who saw all the difficult times, 128 before he died, of the beautiful bride 129 that he acquired with the lance and the nails,
130 sits beside him, and beside the other rests 131 that leader under whom the ungrateful, fickle, and stubborn people 132 lived on manna.
**Malay:**
127 Dan dia yang melihat semua masa sulit, 128 sebelum dia meninggal, dari pengantin perempuan cantik 129 yang diperolehnya dengan tombak dan paku,
130 duduk di sampingnya, dan di samping yang lain beristirahat 131 pemimpin itu yang di bawahnya orang-orang yang tidak tahu berterima kasih, plin-plan, dan keras kepala 132 hidup dari manna.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
145 Veramente, ne forse tu t’arretri 146 movendo l’ali tue, credendo oltrarti, 147 orando grazia conven che s’impetri
148 grazia da quella che puote aiutarti; 149 e tu mi seguirai con l’affezione, 150 sì che dal dicer mio lo cor non parti».
query.result:
**English:**
145 Truly, perhaps you will stop 146 moving your wings, believing you can go beyond, 147 praying for grace that must be implored
148 grace from her who can help you; 149 and you will follow me with affection, 150 so that your heart does not depart from my words."
**Malay:**
145 Sesungguhnya, mungkin engkau akan berhenti 146 menggerakkan sayapmu, percaya engkau dapat melampauinya, 147 memohon rahmat yang harus dimohonkan
148 rahmat dari dia yang dapat menolongmu; 149 dan engkau akan mengikutiku dengan kasih sayang, 150 sehingga hatimu tidak menjauh dari perkataanku."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
151 E cominciò questa santa orazione:
query.result:
**English:**
151 And he began this holy prayer:
**Malay:**
151 Dan mulailah doa suci ini:
